about_the_game: From the mind of legendary special make-up effects creator, producer, and director Greg Nicotero, comes this twisted new Leatherface created exclusively for The Texas Chain Saw Massacre. Featuring one the franchise's most horrific depictions to date, this Leatherface wears a mask that combines the faces of multiple Victims into a gruesome masterpiece, while touting an entirely new menacing chainsaw to go along with it. This pack even includes a brand new kill for your enjoyment!

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains frequent violence and gore.
